title: A full stack website: Daniel's Lab
description:
A modern, full-stack portfolio site featuring:

- **Frontend** — Tag input with throttling/drag-to-delete; Blog filtering with debounced auto-submit
- **Backend** — Authentication from scratch with OAuth; Pluggable full-text search (ES/Meilisearch)
- **DevOps** — CI/CD with automated tests; One-command VPS provisioning

title: Book Me: a meeting room booking calendar
description:
A modern, intuitive **room booking system** for students at Hive Helsinki.
- featuring a **scrollable** calendar UI, a custom **gridless layout**.
- Applies **RBAC** (Role-Based Access Control) with conflict prevention.

title: MushFinder: a mushroom identification helper
description:
An **experimental AI toy** powered by a custom CNN model.
- Built with **transfer learning** from ConvNeXt
- Trained on the **20 most common mushrooms** in Finnish forests
- Offers both **online** and **offline Edge ML** versions
